sentences.english: The massecuite thus obtained is then separated into anhydrous crystals of maltitol and mother liquor by conventional separation methods.
sentences.chinese: 結晶糖膏用常規有分離設備分成麥芽糖醇晶體和母液。

sentences.english: and you can eat some of the barley-sugar window, it tastes so nice.
sentences.chinese: 你可以喫一些麥芽糖做的窗戶，它嚐起來太美味了。

sentences.english: Stew the chicken for 30 minutes. Remove and brush it with malt sugar.
sentences.chinese: 燜約三十分鐘後盛起，於雞身塗麥芽糖。

sentences.english: Fix the chicken on a flat sieve, hang in dry area for 2 hours.
sentences.chinese: 把雞肉攤平固定，掃上麥芽糖，在通風處吊乾兩小時。

sentences.english: Lastly, stir in maltose and stir well to blend.
sentences.chinese: 最後，加入麥芽糖，翻炒混合均勻。

sentences.english: There are a very marked differences of glucose with maltose.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄糖和麥芽糖間呈現極顯著性差異。

sentences.english: Maltose went down to 2% with 40% ethanol elution.
sentences.chinese: 的乙醇洗脫液中麥芽糖含量僅爲2%。
麥芽糖使小孩的脾氣變得甜甜的。

sentences.english: Alpha-transglucosidase is a critical enzyme of producing isomaltooligosaccharide.
sentences.chinese: 轉移葡萄糖苷酶是生產低聚異麥芽糖的關鍵酶。

sentences.english: Maltose is used in infant foods and in malted milk.
sentences.chinese: 麥芽糖可用於生產嬰兒的食品和麥牙乳。

sentences.english: Maltose which can be obtained by hydrolysis of starch is an example of a disaccharide.
sentences.chinese: 麥芽糖可由澱粉水解獲得，是雙糖的一個例子。

sentences.english: Maltodextrin is a main negative factor to the crystallization process of maltose.
sentences.chinese: 糊精是妨礙麥芽糖結晶和晶漿過濾的主要因素。

sentences.english: Switch off the fire and add the maltose.
HPLC method was established for the determination of maltose injection.
sentences.chinese: 建立了HPLC法測定麥芽糖注射液的含量。

sentences.english: The production technology of isomaltooligosacharide and relative enzymes are discussed in this pa-per.
sentences.chinese: 對低聚異麥芽糖的生產工藝和相關的酶進行了介紹。

sentences.english: Maltitol in dry form is extremely hygroscopic and deliquescent .
sentences.chinese: 乾燥的麥芽糖醇晶體是很易吸潮和溶解的。
